name: Piccolo Alchimista
description: 19th Century Italy, Alchemist Piccolo is working on his next potion when everything goes wrong...AGAIN, luckily for him, considering what happened last time, he has only shrunk down to the size of a rat. Still a problem though. He must maintain his composure and make his way back to his desk to undo this spell. Will Piccolo ever learn his lesson to read all the instructions before creating his wild and crazy potions?
